page.title: 09A RURAL TEENAGERS LEISURE
page.content: A 14 YEAR OLD TEENAGER FROM THIS AREA ATTENDS A BOARDING SCHOOL DURING THE TERM AS DO MOST OF THE TEENAGERS IN THIS RURAL FARMING COMMUNITY. AT SCHOOL SHE PURSUES SWIMMING, TENNIS,VIOLIN PLAYING,FABRIC PRINTING, WATCHING THE TELEVISION, READING AND PLAYING BADMINTON. AT THE WEEKENDS SHE CAN EITHER STAY AT SCHOOL OR OCCASIONALLY COME HOME OR SEE HER PARENTS AT SCHOOL OR NEAR THE SCHOOL. THEN SHE VISITS FAMILY, GOES INTO THE SURROUNDING TOWNS SHE ALSO GOES TO CHURCH ON SUNDAY. DURING HER HOLIDAYS SHE COMES HOME AND WORKS ON HER FATHER'S FARM, MEETS HER FRIENDS TO PLAY BADMINTON, TENNIS, GO SWIMMING OR TO GO INTO THE LOCAL TOWNS. TO DO ALL THESE SHE NEEDS TRANSPORTING BY CAR OR SHE CYCLES TO HER FRIENDS NEARBY.
